original_title: GPS Trackers for inter-provincial buses – NTC
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The National Transport Commission is taking steps to digitalize its transport system by installing GPS trackers in inter-provincial buses.
The tracking systems have been installed onto at least one-third of the inter-provincial buses registered under the NTC, Director General of the National Transport Commission Nilan Miranda said.
